title: Circle Apps
description: Building Social media experiences with feature Login, Register, Posts, Replies, Follows, and Likes. Developed using Typescript, React.js, and PostgreSQL

title: Trivia Apps
description: A multiplayer game where users can connect with each other and play charades. this application is built with node.js, express.js, websocket.

title: NoYo
description: Developed an online hotel booking system similar to Airbnb. Built with React JS, Node.js, Express.js, TypeScript, and MongoDB.

title: Baltify (Frontend & Bakcend not integrate)
description: Devloped an online music player like spotify. Build with React JS, Node.js, Express.js, TypeScript and MongoDB

title: BalPay (Not Integrate FE & BE)
description: Building E-commerce with feature Login, Register, and Payment Gateway. Developed using Typescript, React.js, Express JS, Golang, and PostgreSQL
